ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Greetings all
ygData.msgSnippet: this is the only one i saw on egroups. i know how you feel we just passed our half way point on our med. can t wait to get back to Norfolk and some online
ygData.messageBody:
this is the only one i saw on egroups. i know how you feel we just passed
our half way point on our med. can't wait to get back to Norfolk and some
online gaming.

Duct tape is like the force. It has a dark side and a light side and it
hold the universe together...
---carl zwanzig
